name: Descent of Divinity
title: Albedo: Descent of Divinity
desc: "The process of confirming the strategy for a duel also requires meticulous calculations..."
in_play_description: When you have Albedo on the field with this card equipped, if there is Solar Isotoma on your side, your characters' Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Albedo to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Albedo, equip this card.
After Albedo equips this card, immediately use Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma.
When there is Albedo on the field who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has Solar Isotoma, then your characters' Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.
(You must have Albedo in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
